thread.section_title: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent!!
thread.title_full: Excellent!! - Review of Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Sofia Emilia S
title: Excellent!!
text:
This hotel is an excellent choice when staying in Manhattan. I stayed there for 6 night and my experience was amazing. It has a perfect location, near Times Square, 5th Avenue and all the main attractions. The breakfast that was included was really good.
I would like to specially thank Tiara who was of a great help while dealing with some shipping issues. She was always willing to help with a great smile. What a great customer service!
